title.rendered: RHINO 4X4 EVOLUTION REAR BUMPER BAR – DODGE RAM 2500 2014 – 2022

content.rendered:
The new and exciting RHINO 4X4 EVOLUTION REAR BUMPER BAR FOR DODGE RAM 2500 2014+ is available for order now. These new bars give your 4WD an aggressive but styled look without looking like a farm truck. They are a tough 3 and 5mm all steel construction and protect the rear of your vehicle. They also include a great angle of departure and a tread for entering the rear of your vehicle. They look great optioned in full stainless steel.

-The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing Powder coat and available standard in black. It is a 3mm and 6mm all steel construction. Our rear bars are very unique will defiantly stand out amongst the crowd.

-On request they can be optioned to be non-reverse sensor compatible and supplied with blanketing plugs.

Includes:

Rear bar in black

Non slip tread plate

 

RHINO 4X4 EVOLUTION REAR BUMPER BAR – DODGE RAM 2500 2014+

Tough never looked so good

excerpt.rendered: Stand out in the crowd… The Rhino 4X4 Evolution Rear Bumper Bar – Dodge Ram 2500 2014 – 2022 is here at Automax 4X4.
